metadata.dc:title: Correlation of COVID-19 cases/deaths and the Gold price
metadata.dc:creator: Ludwig Burtscher (https://orcid.org/0000-0001-5453-8074)
metadata.dc:subject: COVID-19 cases/deaths development correlation over time with Gold prices
metadata.dc:description: The tool provides an automated way of correlating COVID-19 cases and deaths in a given time interval with the gold price in the same interval.
metadata.dc:source: European Centre For Disease Prevention And Control (2020) "Sonraí faoi choróinvíreas COVID-19". Publications Office. doi: 10.2906/101099100099/1.
